name: Skitchin'
overview: Remember Road Rash? The bad boys who made Rash are back to thrash in Skitchin'. Grab your skates, steal a ride on a car bumper and yer off! Skatin' & Hitchin'- Skitchin'. It's Bitchin'! Race in 12 locations, all with realistic city scapes. Use weapons to fend off opponents: baseball bat, crow bar, nunchaku, chain, whip and stun rod. Earn money to replace and upgrade your equipment. Take a jump and pick a trick for bonus cash. Skitch the cops cars if you're feelin lucky. Challenge a friend to race in two-player simultaneous racing.
